Name: Victory Belt
LongDescription: May seal one of an enemy's known moves when it attacks the Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Hitmonchan.  You can get a Victory Belt at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: Tyro-Sweat, Tyro-Card, and Muscle Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
